name: Glitch Garden (David Tan)
description:
Programming Language Used: C#

Game Engine Used: Unity

Team Size: Solo

Role: Designer/Programmer

  • Designed and created a Plant vs Zombies style game project.
  • Created a settings menu to handle volume and difficulty levels.
  • Implemented quick saving using Unity's PlayerPrefs system in order to save and restore volume and difficulty settings adjusted by the player.
  • Animated defender and attacker sprites using respective sprite sheets.

Controls:

  • Left click to select and place defender
